thread.title: Microsoft Delays New 10 Builds Until Next Week
thread.title_full: Microsoft Delays New Windows 10 Builds Until Next Week - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Delays New 10 Builds Until Next Week
text: Microsoft promised to release new Windows 10 builds for both PCs and mobile after the October 6 event and while everyone expected this to happen sometime this week, it turns out that Redmond needs more time to deal with the bugs it found at the last minute. Gabriel Aul, head of the Windows Insider program, explained on Twitter that the Windows development team has to look into some issues and when fixes are ready, the build should become available for everyone. There's n... Â»
